Package de.oth.blocklib.helper

Class Transformation

java.lang.Object
de.oth.blocklib.helper.Transformation
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public final class Transformation
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
Abstraction class for the position, rotation and scale of an object in the world. Any Transformation without a parent is given in global coordinates, otherwise in the local coordinate system of the parent.
Author:
Tobias Werner SoSe 18
See Also:
Serialized Form

  • Constructor Details

    • Transformation

      public Transformation()
      Creates an unrotated Transformation with default scale at location (0/0/0).

    • Transformation

      public Transformation​(org.lwjgl.util.vector.Vector3f position, org.lwjgl.util.vector.Quaternion rotation, org.lwjgl.util.vector.Vector3f scale)
      Creates a Transformation with the given scale and rotation at a given position.
      Parameters:
      position - Position in world space coordinates
      rotation - rotation relative to world space
      scale - Factors to scale by along the x-, y- and z-axis

    • Transformation

      public Transformation​(Transformation parent)
      Creates a Transformation and attaches it to a parent. The global Transformation is the same as the parent.
      Parameters:
      parent - Parent to attach this Transformation to

  • Method Details

    • setIdentity

      public void setIdentity()
      Sets this Transformation to be unrotated, with default scale and at (0/0/0)

    • translate

      public void translate​(org.lwjgl.util.vector.Vector3f deltaPos)
      Adds a translation to the current position
      Parameters:
      deltaPos - translation in local space

    • setRotation

      public void setRotation​(float x, float y, float z)
      Sets the rotation around 3 axes relative to the parent.
      Parameters:
      x - rotation around the local x-axis in radians
      y - rotation around the local y-axis in radians
      z - rotation around the local z-axis in radians

    • setRotation

      public void setRotation​(org.lwjgl.util.vector.Vector3f axis, float angle)
      Sets the rotation relative to the parent to a rotation around an axis.
      Parameters:
      axis - Rotation axis in local coordinates
      angle - Rotation angle in radians

      Parameters:

      Parameters:

    • getScale

      public org.lwjgl.util.vector.Vector3f getScale()
      Returns the scale relative to the parent.
      Returns:
      local scale factors of this Transformation

    • setScale

      public void setScale​(org.lwjgl.util.vector.Vector3f scale)
      Sets the scale relative to the parent.
      Parameters:
      scale - factors to scale by along the local x-, y- and z-axis.

    • setScale

      public void setScale​(float scale)
      Sets the (uniform) scale relative to the parent.
      Parameters:
      scale - factor to scale by along all axes

    • getParent

      public Transformation getParent()
      Returns the parent this Transformation is attached to, or null if it has no parent.
      Returns:
      parent of this Transformation

    • setParent

      public void setParent​(Transformation parent)
      Sets a new parent for this Transformation, keeping the local position, rotation and scale. If parent is null, the local coordinate system equals that of the world. Note that this will change the world position, rotation and scale of the Object!
      Parameters:
      parent - parent to attach this Transformation to

    • getLocalMatrix

      public org.lwjgl.util.vector.Matrix4f getLocalMatrix()
      Gets the current local Transformation Matrix, which represents the Transformation relative to the parent.
      Returns:
      local transformation matrix of this Transformation

    • getGlobalMatrix

      public org.lwjgl.util.vector.Matrix4f getGlobalMatrix()
      Gets the global Transformation Matrix of this object in world space
      Returns:
      global transformation matrix (aka model matrix) of this Transformation

    • getInverseTransformationMatrix

      public org.lwjgl.util.vector.Matrix4f getInverseTransformationMatrix()
      Gets the inverse global Transformation Matrix of this object
      Returns:
      inverse global transformation matrix (aka inverse model matrix) of this Transformation

    • setLocalChanged

      private void setLocalChanged()
      Call when this transform has changed

    • setGlobalChanged

      private void setGlobalChanged()
      Call when this transform or any parent has changed in any way to notify all children

    • forward

      public org.lwjgl.util.vector.Vector3f forward()
      Get the the normalized direction vector of the local negative z-axis in global coordinates
      Returns:
      world space vector pointing along the local negative z-axis of this Transformation

    • right

      public org.lwjgl.util.vector.Vector3f right()
      Get the the normalized direction vector of the local x-axis in global coordinates
      Returns:
      world space vector pointing along the local x-axis of this Transformation

    • up

      public org.lwjgl.util.vector.Vector3f up()
